translation.en: ♪ I never beg for no money ♪ ♪ Fun, fun, funny You'll run from me ♪
[woman] Almost there. Just pulling the encryption key.
translation.es: Ya casi. Saco la clave de encriptación.

translation.en: Four hours in the van, and she's eaten all the crisps.
translation.es: Se comió todas las papas en cuatro horas.

translation.en: She's stuck in there with you, so that's comfort eating.
translation.es: Está encerrada contigo, tuvo que hacerlo.

translation.en: Been boring her with your cat chat again?
Cat chat? Actually, Parker, she likes my Barry the Cat stories.
translation.es: - ¿Volviste a aburrirla hablando del gato? - ¿Qué? Le gustan mis historias del gato Barry, Parker.

translation.en: You like my Barry the Cat stories, right?
Before you know it, you're gonna want one of your own.
translation.es: Antes de que te des cuenta, querrás uno.

translation.en: [inhales sharply] Cats hate me. Sorry, Bailey.
translation.es: Los gatos me odian. Perdón, Bailey.

translation.en: I have eyes on Mulvaney. Intel was good.
translation.es: Veo a Mulvaney. La información era cierta.

translation.en: Europe's most wanted arms dealer seen for the first time in three years.
translation.es: Vemos por primera vez en tres años al traficante de armas más buscado de Europa.

translation.en: Adding names and faces to the guest list.
translation.es: Añado nombres y rostros a la lista de invitados.

translation.en: -How long do you need? -[Stone] Nearly there.
Hang on. Something's changed. I can't connect.
translation.es: Esperen, cambió algo. No puedo conectarme.

translation.en: The system's offline. Local access only.
translation.es: Desconectaron el sistema. Solo acceso local.

translation.en: We need a new plan to get you in. What do you mean?
translation.es: - Necesitamos un nuevo plan para entrar. - ¿Cuál?

translation.en: I need direct access to someone who's already on the network.
translation.es: Necesito acceso directo a alguien que esté en la red.

translation.en: Head of security. He's at the bar.
translation.es: El jefe de seguridad. En el bar.

translation.en: [Stone] I could hack his phone, but I'll need to be close to him.
translation.es: Podría hackear su teléfono si estuviera cerca de él.

translation.en: [Parker] Stone, you're not a field agent. Do not get out of the van.
translation.es: Stone, no eres agente de campo. No salgas de la camioneta.

translation.en: Our arms dealer's on the move right now, and I do not wanna lose him.
translation.es: El traficante de armas se aleja y no quiero perderlo.

translation.en: [Bailey] There's no other way. We have to get Mulvaney.
translation.es: No hay más opciones. Debemos atraparlo.

translation.en: When I'm within ten feet of the head of security, call his phone.
translation.es: Llama al jefe de seguridad cuando lo tenga a tres metros.

translation.en: [Parker] I can't tail them any further.
[woman] Stone, listen to me. Waiter to your right. Grab a glass of champagne.
translation.es: Stone, escúchame. Camarero a tu derecha. Toma una copa de champaña.

translation.en: [Parker] He's headed towards the blackjack table.
translation.es: Se dirige a la mesa de blackjack.

translation.en: Do you know how to play?
I was on the chess team.
[dealer] One hundred, sir, in change. Okay. Everybody ready?
translation.es: Cambio de cien en fichas. Bien, ¿todos listos?

translation.en: Maybe I should quit while I'm ahead.
Not bad for your first time out of the van. I think I just lost two years off my life.
translation.es: - Nada mal para tu primera vez. - Perdí dos años de mi vida.

translation.en: Okay. Got him. Through the kitchen, down the stairs.
translation.es: Lo tengo. Pasen la cocina, bajen la escalera.
Hay dos matones en la puerta.
Les doy acceso de reconocimiento facial.

translation.en: I'm almost afraid to see what drew Mulvaney out of his hole.
translation.es: Casi me da miedo ver qué sacó a Mulvaney de su agujero.

translation.en: [announcer] We're now taking bets for the next game, which will begin in two minutes.
translation.es: Aceptamos apuestas para el próximo juego que comenzará en dos minutos.

translation.en: [woman] You were right about Mulvaney's gambling habit.
He never met a bet he didn't place.
[announcer] You must predict the exact order of kills.
translation.es: Debes predecir el orden exacto de las muertes.

translation.en: [soldier] Copy, Delta Kilo Six. We have reported hostiles…
[announcer] With a bet of four instant kills,
translation.es: Con una apuesta de cuatro bajas,

translation.en: this is a win for player number 46.
Just a bit to your right.
That's US Navy Seals in real-time.
translation.es: Es la Marina de EE. UU. en tiempo real.

translation.en: And they've cracked military-grade encryption. Who would have that capability?
translation.es: Y descifraron la codificación militar. ¿Quién podría hacer algo así?

translation.en: Enough tech talk. Target is Mulvaney.
translation.es: Olviden eso. El objetivo es Mulvaney.

translation.en: Okay, Dr. Yang. You have the floor.
Time to give Mulvaney his heart attack.
[Yang] I'll handle this guy. You take Mulvaney.
translation.es: Yo me ocupo de él. Ve por Mulvaney.

translation.en: Mulvaney's on your right. Another service corridor.
translation.es: Mulvaney está en el pasillo a tu derecha.

translation.en: I've got Mulvaney. Bailey, get us out of here. Fast.
translation.es: Tengo a Mulvaney. Bailey, sácanos de aquí. Rápido.

translation.en: You guys really need to work on your subtlety.
I should've listened to the voices in my head.
translation.es: Debí haber oído a las voces en mi mente.

translation.en: "The British are coming. The British are coming."

translation.es: - No me digas. - Bien. Nuevo plan.

translation.en: Exfil route Bravo. We have to go dark.
Copy that. See you down there.
They're heading to the cable car station. Parker's a sitting duck.
translation.es: Van al teleférico. Parker es un blanco fácil. Debemos ir ya mismo.

translation.en: We need to get down there now.
translation.es: Parker es un blanco fácil. Debemos ir ya mismo.

translation.en: Jack, this is Nine of Hearts. Urgent forecast required.
translation.es: Jota, soy Nueve de Corazones. Necesito ya un pronóstico.

translation.en: Nine, we have your position and the full overview.
translation.es: Tenemos tu ubicación y todos los datos.

translation.en: The MI6 team won't get down the mountain in time.
translation.es: El MI6 no logrará llegar a tiempo.

translation.en: The Heart gives a 93 percent chance that Parker will die
translation.es: El Corazón da un 93 % de probabilidades de que Parker muera y Mulvaney escape

translation.en: and Mulvaney will get away unless the Charter intervenes.
translation.es: El Corazón da un 93 % de probabilidades de que Parker muera y Mulvaney escape a menos que intervenga el Cártel.

translation.en: Fifty meters away, over the handrail to your right.
translation.es: A 50 metros, sobre el pasamanos a tu derecha.

translation.en: The Heart has a chance of success at just 32 percent.
translation.es: Las probabilidades de éxito son solo del 32 %.

translation.en: Um… Stone, big drop coming up. Big drop.
translation.es: Stone, se acerca un precipicio muy grande.

translation.en: Eight minutes out. We're not gonna make it.
translation.es: Estamos a ocho minutos. No llegaremos.

translation.en: Stone, Mulvaney's security are arriving at the cable car station.
translation.es: Stone, la seguridad de Mulvaney está llegando al teleférico.

translation.en: Take the route to your left. You need to pick up the pace.
translation.es: Toma la ruta a tu izquierda. Debes acelerar el ritmo.

translation.en: The terrain's too flat, and you're losing altitude.
translation.es: El terreno es plano y pierdes altitud.

translation.en: If you cut across to the piste, you can pick up a snow bike.
translation.es: Cruza la pista y usa una moto de nieve.

translation.en: He can hold them off without us, right?
[Jack] You can get ahead of the bikes at the next corner.
translation.es: Puedes pasar a las motos en la curva.

translation.en: Stone, watch Bailey and Yang to your right.
translation.es: Tienes a Bailey y Yang a tu derecha.

translation.en: The Charter's worked too hard to embed you in MI6.
translation.es: El Cártel se esforzó por integrarte al MI6.

translation.en: How many in the welcome party?
Four pistols, one shotgun, and a sniper
translation.es: Cuatro pistolas, una escopeta y un francotirador

translation.en: [Jack] Get away from them. Take the path to your right.
translation.es: Aléjate de ellos. Ve a la derecha.

translation.en: The sniper has opened fire on Parker.

translation.es: La probabilidad de éxito subió al 85 %.

translation.en: Uh… two more on your right.
Parker and target still very much alive.
translation.es: Parker y el blanco siguen vivos.

translation.en: Now, hide the bodies and get out before MI6 sees you.
translation.es: Oculta los cuerpos y vete antes que te vean los del MI6.

translation.en: Mulvaney had an army of security.
[Parker] Got scared off by the sirens maybe?
No point waiting to find out. Let's just grab him and go.

translation.es: Le sale espuma de la boca.

translation.en: Grab a leg. We have to get back up the mountain for Stone.
translation.es: Agarra una pierna. Debemos volver por Stone.

translation.en: ♪ For myself 'Cause I've been quiet way too long ♪
♪ Believe me, all I want is you ♪
The Italians are livid, as are Defense and Number 10.
translation.es: Los italianos, la Defensa y el PM están furiosos.

translation.en: -I take full responsibility. -[man] "I." That's your problem, Parker.
translation.es: - Yo me hago cargo de todo. - "Yo". Ese es tu problema, Parker.

translation.en: Mulvaney's dead. Yang gave the wrong person a heart attack.
translation.es: Mulvaney murió, Yang le dio un infarto a la persona equivocada.

translation.en: And Stone, what the hell were you thinking getting out of the van?
translation.es: Y Stone, ¿por qué diablos saliste de la camioneta?

translation.en: -That was the only way she could get-- -[man] Put it in the report.
translation.es: - Era la única forma de… - Ponlo en el informe.

translation.en: Paperwork. Excellent. That'll show Mulvaney's lads who's boss.
translation.es: El papeleo sí que asustará a los tipos de Mulvaney.

translation.en: Mulvaney's gone. And so is any hope of using him as an asset.
translation.es: Mulvaney murió junto con la esperanza de poder usarlo.

translation.en: But now we have a new target.
Someone broke through the highest levels of military encryption, including our own.
translation.es: Alguien hackeó los más altos niveles de encriptación militar.

translation.en: -Did you look into the girl? -[man] The girl?
Oh, yes. I'm afraid we'll need more than that.
translation.es: Sí. Me temo que necesitaremos más que eso.

translation.en: We are trying to trace her, but so far, we have nothing.
translation.es: La buscamos, sin suerte por ahora.

translation.en: -I'm happy to look-- -[man] We have people for that. Different people.
translation.es: - Con gusto… - Tenemos a otras personas para eso.

translation.en: You can all concentrate on your admin. Sandra.
-First time out of the van. -[all] Hey!
translation.es: - Por su primera vez en el campo. - ¡Sí!

translation.en: -[Bailey] And she didn't blow the op-- -[Yang] No, we did that all on our own.
translation.es: - Y no arruinó la operación… - No, fuimos nosotros.

translation.en: Too bad. Been on a good winning streak since Stone joined us.
translation.es: Qué pena. El primer fracaso desde que Stone se unió.

translation.en: Thought you might be our lucky charm. But you did win at blackjack.
translation.es: Creí que nos traías buena suerte. Pero ganaste en el blackjack.

translation.en: And I'm never gambling again or stepping out of the van.
translation.es: Y jamás volveré a apostar ni a salir de la camioneta.

translation.en: What'd you do when I left you up there?
-What? You said to stay out of sight. -True.
We got more important things to discuss.
translation.es: Tenemos otras cosas de qué hablar.

translation.en: But let's be honest. We already know who she works for.
translation.es: Vamos, ya sabemos para quién trabaja.

translation.en: Whatever. I just identified another one of their ops.
translation.es: Como sea. Identifiqué a otro de sus agentes.

translation.en: They took out a terror cell who hijacked an oil tanker in the Panama Canal.
translation.es: Detuvieron a terroristas que habían robado un petrolero en el canal de Panamá.

translation.en: Yeah, but who would have that kind of power?
Okay, fine, mock me. But it's true.
translation.es: Está bien, búrlense, pero es cierto.

translation.en: Ex-intelligence operatives answering only to themselves.
translation.es: Ex agentes de inteligencia que no le responden a nadie.

translation.en: No national allegiances, no political leanings.
Putting out fires their governments never allowed them to. That's…
translation.es: Apagan incendios que los gobiernos ignoran.

translation.en: working together to keep peace in a turbulent world.
translation.es: colaborando para mantener la paz en un mundo turbulento.

translation.en: No. That is a Saturday morning cartoon.
translation.es: No, eso es una caricatura para niños.

translation.en: Nobody knows about the Charter because they don't exist.
translation.es: Nadie sabe del Cártel porque no existe.

translation.en: This girl is part of it, and you know it.
translation.es: Esta chica es parte del Cártel y lo saben.

translation.en: Okay, don't judge me. I'm gonna go with this for a sec.
translation.es: No me juzguen. Le seguiré el juego.
Si el Cártel es tan bueno,

translation.en: Sorry, Bailey, there is no secret genius organization pulling all the strings.
translation.es: Lo siento, no hay una organización secreta que controle todo a su gusto.

translation.en: It's just us, Sandra, and her paperwork.
translation.es: No hay más que nosotros, Sandra y su papeleo.

translation.en: But it was a nice bedtime story. Speaking of which…
translation.es: Pero fue un lindo cuento para dormir. Hablando de eso…

translation.en: -Jet lag. -Um, there's a one-hour time difference.
translation.es: Desfase horario. Hay una hora de diferencia.

translation.en: -I drive with that eye. -Might make you a better driver.
translation.es: - Lo uso para conducir. - Quizá conduzcas mejor.

translation.en: A field agent should be ready for anything.
translation.es: Un agente está listo para todo.

translation.en: You were saying? I never should have told you I swim.
translation.es: ¿Qué decías? Nunca debí decirte que nado.

translation.en: No news. We were told not to look.
Look, if we leave it to the pen-pushers at MI6,
translation.es: Si se los dejamos a los trajeados del MI6,

translation.en: she'll hack the entire world before we even get a name.
I should've gone beyond the mission and brought her in.
Well, your hands were pretty full at the time.
And besides, it wasn't our objective.
Why don't you try and live a little? Could be fun.
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si vives un poco? Podrías divertirte.

translation.en: What happened to "Don't get out of the van, Rachel"? Ah.
translation.es: ¿Qué pasó con "No salgas de la camioneta"?

translation.en: So, rules are rules unless they apply to you.
translation.es: Las reglas valen para todos menos para ti.

translation.en: Why do I feel like you know me better than I know you?
translation.es: ¿Por qué me conoces mejor que yo a ti?

translation.en: Maybe I should listen to one of these dreary podcasts of yours.
translation.es: Quizá debería escuchar uno de tus tontos podcasts.

translation.en: Mock our music, and I won't tell you my theory.
translation.es: Búrlate de la música y no oirás mi teoría.

translation.en: She's new to the scene. Has to be. Otherwise, we would have heard about her.
translation.es: Tiene que ser nueva en el juego o habríamos oído hablar de ella.

translation.en: To get a guest list like that--
She's working with someone else. A veteran. But who?
We'll make a list. I'll bring snacks.
I, uh, I'm sorry. I already have… a brunch date.
translation.es: Lo siento. Ya tengo una cita para almorzar.

translation.en: Nine of Hearts, it's good to see you.
translation.es: Nueve de Corazones, qué bueno verte.

translation.en: -How's it going? -It's been busy. This way.
The Charter has been dealing with three actionable threats this morning.
translation.es: El Cártel afronta tres amenazas hoy.

translation.en: Potential sarin gas attack in Paris.
translation.es: Un posible ataque con gas sarín en París.

translation.en: The Heart predicted the time and location of the attack with 87% certainty.
translation.es: El Corazón predijo con un 87 % de certeza la hora y el lugar del ataque.

translation.en: Eight of Hearts is on site now.
Six is defusing a potential international incident
translation.es: Seis apacigua un posible incidente internacional
en el mar de China Meridional.

translation.en: And Diamonds team's handling hackers targeting the North American power grid.
translation.es: Los Diamantes lidian con hackers que atacan la red eléctrica de EE. UU.

translation.en: Enjoying your new office? We can't all be gallivanting around the Alps.
translation.es: - ¿Te gusta tu nueva oficina? - No todos podemos ir a los Alpes.

translation.en: How's King of Hearts? Is she angry?
Well, let's see. You lost control of the situation, target is dead,
translation.es: Repasemos: perdiste el control de todo, el blanco murió y mataste a seis hombres.

translation.en: then you had to kill six men.
translation.es: el blanco murió y mataste a seis hombres.
Qué fabuloso resultado. Pronto recibirás las medallas.
Qué fabuloso resultado. Pronto recibirás las medallas. Hola, Nómada.

translation.en: Good to see you too. Love what you've done with the place.
translation.es: También me alegra verte. Me encanta la decoración.

translation.en: Is she developing a sense of humor?
She is from Pune in the west of India.
translation.es: Es de Pune, en el oeste de la India.

translation.en: Had business in Pune. Ran IT workshops for kids in underprivileged communities.
translation.es: Dirigió talleres de IT en Pune para niños en comunidades desfavorecidas.

translation.en: [Stone] He spotted her in one of these programs.
translation.es: La encontró en uno de estos programas.

translation.en: Yeah. He saw she was a prodigy, took her under his wing, trained her up,
translation.es: Sí. Vio que era un prodigio, la eligió, la entrenó

translation.en: and then they had a falling out.
[Nomad] The Heart's better at whats than whys. And the what is, she split from Kharche and disappeared.
translation.es: El Corazón sabe el qué, no el porqué. Se separó de Kharche y desapareció.

translation.en: Not much older than when we met.
translation.es: Casi como cuando te conocí a ti.

translation.en: [Nomad] Yes, but she fell in with a bunch of criminal lowlifes.
translation.es: Pero ella se unió a muchos delincuentes.

translation.en: Some people get all the luck.
We think that Keya set up the casino of blood.
translation.es: Creemos que Keya creó el Casino de Sangre.

translation.en: She knew about Mulvaney's gambling habit and used it to lure him in.
translation.es: Sabía de la adicción de Mulvaney y la usó para atraerlo.

translation.en: Mulvaney had become obsessed with a new weapon, a myth.
translation.es: Mulvaney se había obsesionado con una nueva arma, un mito.

translation.en: A quantum computer sophisticated enough to hack into anything, anywhere.
translation.es: Una computadora cuántica capaz de hackear lo que sea, donde sea.
El Corazón predice con un 96 % de certeza

translation.en: that Keya is heading to Lisbon for the opening of Club Moritz.
translation.es: que va a Lisboa a la inauguración del Club Moritz.

translation.en: So, we will leak her location to MI6.
translation.es: Así que le daremos su ubicación al MI6.

translation.en: Then we should have your operation back up and running within 24 hours.
translation.es: Deberían asignarte la operación dentro de 24 horas.

translation.en: Keya chose to hack into our comms feed on the mountain.
translation.es: Keya hackeó nuestra comunicación en la montaña.

translation.en: She revealed herself to me, looked me straight in the eye.
translation.es: Se reveló, me miró a los ojos.

translation.en: I'm not sure if we should ignore the Heart,
translation.es: No sé si deberíamos ignorar al Corazón,

translation.en: the closest mankind has to perfect intelligence,
translation.es: lo más cercano a la inteligencia perfecta,

translation.en: because of eye contact in a bar.
translation.es: solo porque te miró en el bar.

translation.en: This might be why you're single, Jack.
Just not with your MI6 team.
translation.es: Pero no con los del MI6.

translation.en: So, you're spying on me now.
You know what you signed up for.
What we do is too important.
translation.es: Lo que hacemos es muy importante.

translation.en: When governments fail, the only thing left is the Charter.
translation.es: Cuando los gobiernos fallan, solo queda el Cártel.

translation.en: I'm undercover. This is just part of it.
translation.es: Estoy encubierto. Esto es parte de eso.

translation.en: Come on, Keya. Take the bait.
[Bailey] Hey. We got a lead on hacker girl. We're going to Lisbon.
translation.es: Hola. Tenemos una pista sobre la hacker. Iremos a Lisboa.

translation.en: Oh no, no. Barry's all right. He's--

translation.es: Le dije que nada de fiestas.

translation.en: [Parker] Ah Jesus. Just when we thought it couldn't get worse.
translation.es: Cielos. Creí que no podía empeorar.

translation.en: -[Bailey] Are you singing? -[Parker] I'm clearing my throat.
translation.es: - ¿Estás cantando, Parker? - No, me aclaro la garganta.

translation.en: ♪ I want to be with you everywhere ♪ ♪ Oh, I ♪
Bailey, you should meet my gran. She has the same taste in music, and you have the same hair.
translation.es: Deberías conocer a mi abuela. Comparten gusto musical y peinado.
Lo siento. Vaya. Un poco más fuerte la próxima. No me rompí un diente.

translation.en: Little harder next time. I didn't quite crack a tooth.
translation.es: Vaya. Un poco más fuerte la próxima. No me rompí un diente.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm fine. I'm just, uh…
Come on, swap seats with me.
-What? No, no, no. It's fine. -Come on. No, it's fine. Move.
translation.es: - ¿Qué? No, está bien. - Vamos, descuida. Muévete.

translation.en: [Parker] Aren't you supposed to be an elite driver?
[Yang] How long till the club opens?
[Bailey] We head out in a couple of hours.
translation.es: Saldremos en un par de horas.

translation.en: Sent you something. Check it out.
-What is this? -It's for my niece's birthday.
translation.es: - ¿Y esto? - Para el cumpleaños de mi sobrina.

translation.en: What do you think? Female perspective?

translation.es: Parker, esta música es de la antigüedad.

translation.en: -What are you, a hundred years old? -It's called culture.
Yeah. Sorry, Parker, I'm with Yang. Yang!
translation.es: Sí. Lo siento, Parker. Estoy con Yang. ¡Yang!

translation.en: Oh, come on, Bailey. You know you want to.
[Bailey] You know you want to. Come on.
Watch out, you might actually enjoy yourself.

translation.es: Seis hostiles entran a la casa…

translation.en: Six hostiles moving up the stairs. More outside.
translation.es: Seis hostiles suben la escalera. Hay más afuera.

translation.en: They'll breach the doorway in four…

translation.es: Ya estoy buscando rutas de escape.

translation.en: Come on. Parker, come on. Come on!
Saving them is not your mission.
No. At best, you break cover. Most likely, you die.
translation.es: No. Te descubrirán o probablemente mueras.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. It works. Just not on every car.
translation.es: Sí, funciona. Pero no en todos los autos.

translation.en: -Away from the guns, Stone. Away! -Just a second.
translation.es: - ¡Aléjanos de las armas, Stone! - Un segundo.

translation.en: Okay, Stone. Time to start talking.
You hack, you fight, and you drive. Parker, are you getting this?
translation.es: Hackeas, peleas y conduces. Parker, ¿ves esto?

translation.en: -Three vehicles. Lots of guns. -Yeah, I can tell by the bullets.
translation.es: - Tres autos. Muchas armas. - Sí, lo noté por las balas.

translation.en: -Stone! -Sort of in the middle of something.
Oh, okay. Okay, you got it.

translation.es: - Yo me ocupo. - A tu derecha.

translation.en: -Are you trying to kill us? -Pretty much the opposite, actually.
Okay. This might be kind of intense.

translation.es: - Stone, aún nos siguen. - Lo sé.

translation.en: Well, I can't speak for the others, but I… I think you're ready for the field.
translation.es: No sé qué opinan ellos, pero creo que estás lista para el campo.

translation.en: We need to get off the road and lose this van.
a baby agent from IT just took out an entire kill team.
translation.es: una agente novata de IT derrotó a asesinos.

translation.en: The Charter? You're the… you're the bloody Charter?
What, are you trying to bring in Dhawan yourself?
I wish I could've told you more.
But we all want the same thing.
You're not the only one with a secret.
translation.es: No eres la única que esconde algo.

translation.en: Did they mean something to you?
Oh, come on, Rachel. You're only playing a part, right?
Why don't you ask the Heart?
If you wanted me dead, you would have shot me first.
translation.es: Ya me habrías disparado si quisieras matarme.

translation.en: [exhales] Still a few things I need to know.
translation.es: Aún me quedan cosas por saber.

translation.en: I was looking forward to a fight.
Keya and I learned that the Charter infiltrated MI6.
translation.es: Keya y yo nos enteramos de que el Cártel estaba en el MI6.

translation.en: I had to flush out who.
At first, I thought it was Yang,
translation.es: Al principio creí que era Yang,

translation.en: but I was so pleased it was you.
translation.es: pero me alegra que seas tú.

translation.en: A little basic, I know, but it hits the spot.
translation.es: Un poco básico, ya sé. Pero es efectivo.

translation.en: Looks like the paralysis is kicking in.
translation.es: Parece que la parálisis hace efecto.

translation.en: I spent six years looking for you people, Stone.
translation.es: Pasé seis años buscando al Cártel, Stone.

translation.en: Then fate brings you straight to me.
translation.es: Y el destino te trajo directo a mí.

translation.en: But you were so busy letting a machine think for you that you missed me.
translation.es: Pero dejaste que una máquina piense por ti y me pasaste por alto.

translation.en: Well, he was tech-averse like me.
translation.es: Era reacio a la tecnología como yo.

translation.en: So, Keya and I set up our casino of blood to lure him in.
translation.es: Así que Keya y yo armamos nuestro Casino de Sangre para atraerlo.

translation.en: We needed to have a little chat about the Heart.
The Heart is what gives the Charter its power.
translation.es: El Corazón vuelve poderoso al Cártel.

translation.en: It's the most formidable weapon you never knew existed.
translation.es: Es el arma más formidable que nunca supiste que existía.

translation.en: It can hack into anything, anywhere.
translation.es: Hackea lo que sea, donde sea.

translation.en: Cell phones, power grids, the banks, governments, military, health records.
translation.es: Celulares, redes eléctricas, bancos, gobiernos, milicias, registros médicos.

translation.en: It knows you better than you know yourself.
translation.es: Te conoce mejor que tú mismo.

translation.en: With access to trillions of data points at once, its modeling is so accurate
translation.es: Con acceso a billones de datos a la vez, su proyección es tan precisa que predice el futuro.
su proyección es tan precisa que predice el futuro.

translation.en: The Heart is knowledge and power.
translation.es: El Corazón es conocimiento y poder.

translation.en: It can crash a market or drop a plane out of the sky.
translation.es: Puede colapsar un mercado o derribar un avión.

translation.en: Who needs to steal a nuclear bomb when you can control them all?
translation.es: ¿Para qué robar una bomba nuclear si puedes controlarlas todas?

translation.en: Only a Charter member could tell you.
translation.es: Solo lo sabría un miembro del Cártel.
Se usaba en la Guerra Fría.

translation.en: My chemist does all the classics.
Killing you is not part of the plan. We need you to deliver a package first.
translation.es: Matarte no es parte del plan. Antes debes entregar algo.

translation.en: [nurse panting] Hold her here. Hold her down.
-[grunting] -Take this. Help me. Help me here.
Wait. Get me atropine. Five mils. It's cholinesterase.
translation.es: Dame cinco mg de atropina. Es un anticolinesterásico.

translation.en: It's… There's a Trojan in our system delivered wirelessly.
translation.es: Con un troyano que ingresó de forma inalámbrica.

translation.en: Chewing through security like it isn't there.
Nomad, I've tried. No-go. They're trying to access the Heart.
translation.es: Ya intenté, no puedo. Intentan acceder al Corazón.

translation.en: It's a weak wireless signal. It's coming from…
translation.es: Es una señal inalámbrica débil. Viene…

translation.en: [doctor] Quickly. We need to monitor her airway.
translation.es: Rápido. Debemos ver su vía respiratoria.

translation.en: -[Stone breathing heavily] -Stone. What's happened? I need to know what's happened.
translation.es: Stone. ¿Qué pasó? Necesito saber qué pasó.

translation.en: [Jack] Three minutes and 45 seconds. Running a system check now.
translation.es: Tres minutos y 45 segundos. Analizo el sistema.

translation.en: We need to know what they accessed. Is the Locker safe?
translation.es: Averigua a qué accedieron. ¿Y el locker?

translation.en: The Locker is still flying high with the Heart safe inside, 85,000 feet up.
translation.es: Sigue a 26 000 metros del suelo con el Corazón dentro a salvo.

translation.en: No one's getting up there without a space shuttle. It's passing over the Atlantic, towards West Africa.
translation.es: Nadie lo alcanzará sin un transbordador. Se dirige hacia África occidental.

translation.en: And the other suits, can they still access the Heart?
translation.es: ¿Los demás palos tiene acceso al Corazón?

translation.en: There've been 100,000 attempts to access files.
translation.es: Hubo 100 000 intentos de acceso a archivos.

translation.en: Clubs team are analyzing the data, but looks like our security held.
translation.es: Los Tréboles analizan los datos, pero la seguridad resistió.

translation.en: We need to shut it all down now.
-Shut what down? The Heart? -Until we know what they've done.
translation.es: - ¿Apagar qué? ¿El Corazón? - Hasta averiguar qué hicieron.

translation.en: We have no idea what they're capable of.
translation.es: No sabemos de qué son capaces.

translation.en: Don't need to shut it down to find out what they've done.
translation.es: No hace falta apagarlo para averiguarlo.

translation.en: -We'd be harming ourselves. -We don't know. She's not stupid.
translation.es: - No nos ayudaría. - No sabemos. No es estúpida.

translation.en: -And neither are we. -Sure about that? Because right now--
Rachel. Rachel. He's right. We'll sort it.
I told you. I knew Keya was playing us, playing the Heart.
translation.es: Te dije que sabía que Keya engañaba al Corazón.

translation.en: No, you didn't. No, you didn't You had a feeling.

translation.es: No tenías nada concreto, nada con qué actuar.

translation.en: A mood, a notion, a hunch, a bollocks. We don't trade in those.
translation.es: No nos manejamos con ideas, corazonadas, idioteces.

translation.en: I knew she wouldn't be there.
You ignored the Heart, and you went back in.
-To save my team. -They weren't your team.
translation.es: - Para salvar a mi equipo. - ¿Tu equipo?

translation.en: They died anyway. You going back made sure of that.
If you'd left when we told you to, Parker would've followed you,
translation.es: Si te hubieras ido, Parker te habría seguido,

translation.en: we'd have caught him, and Yang and Bailey might be alive.
translation.es: lo habríamos atrapado, y quizá no habrían muerto.

translation.en: -I should've just listened to the Heart? -Yes.
The Charter exists for one reason.
translation.es: El Cártel existe por una razón:

translation.en: To maximize lives saved. That's the only moral metric there is.
translation.es: salvar cuantas vidas se pueda. Es la única métrica moral. Un cálculo.

translation.en: And it's a calculation. A pure and objective calculation.
translation.es: Es la única métrica moral. Un cálculo. Un cálculo puro y objetivo.

translation.en: Made for us by a machine.
Have you forgotten how radical that is?
It doesn't mean that what we do is easy or feels nice.
translation.es: No significa que lo que hacemos sea fácil o agradable.

translation.en: You'll have the voices of those people in your head for the rest of your life.
translation.es: Las voces de esas personas jamás te abandonarán

translation.en: And you will never not feel responsible for them ever.
translation.es: y nunca dejarás de sentirte responsable por ellas.

translation.en: But the end justifies the means.
translation.es: Pero el fin justifica los medios.

translation.en: I spent every day with Parker for a year and didn't see it coming.
translation.es: Pasé un año entero con Parker y no me lo vi venir.

translation.en: So, what do we do now?
Gonna make some tough choices, and this is the first one.
Go home. Get some rest. Keep your head down. Don't do anything stupid.
translation.es: Ve a casa. Descansa. Mantén un perfil bajo. Nada de tonterías.

translation.en: Parker knows you. Dhawan knows you.
And the other Kings, quite rightly… don't know if you can be trusted.
translation.es: Los otros reyes, con toda la razón, desconfían de ti.

translation.en: I want to protect what we've spent 20 years trying to build.
translation.es: Quiero proteger lo que nos llevó 20 años intentar construir.

translation.en: [Keya] So, why is a Charter agent riding around all alone, just hours after being poisoned?
translation.es: ¿Por qué anda sola una agente del Cártel horas después de haber sido envenenada?

translation.en: Doesn't feel like they're taking care of their most valuable player.
translation.es: Parece que descuidan a su agente más valiosa.

translation.en: I bet you used to think we were so alike. Now you know I'm better.
translation.es: Seguro creías que éramos iguales. Ahora sabes que soy mejor.

translation.en: Well, I told you this wasn't a game, Keya.
translation.es: Te dije que esto no era un juego, Keya.
Con el Corazón o sin él,

translation.en: All four kings in the same room. How long has it been, three years?
translation.es: Los cuatro reyes juntos después de… ¿tres años?

translation.en: So, who is this Parker, and how did we miss him?
translation.es: ¿Quién es este Parker y cómo lo pasamos por alto?

translation.en: Career intelligence agent. Born in Belfast, lives alone.
translation.es: Agente de inteligencia. Nació en Belfast, vive solo.

translation.en: He has no one he cares for. There's nothing much to live for.
translation.es: No tiene a nadie que le importe ni mucho por qué vivir.

translation.en: He has devoted his life to a country that sees him as expendable.
translation.es: Dedicó su vida a un país que lo considera prescindible.

translation.en: Okay. We get it. All that is fuel for the fire.
translation.es: Bien, ya entendemos. Todo eso es combustible, pero no se enciende sin una chispa.

translation.en: -But it won't burn without a spark. -[woman] I was getting to that.
translation.es: Todo eso es combustible, pero no se enciende sin una chispa. A eso quería llegar.

translation.en: I had to lean extremely hard on some very old friends for this.
translation.es: Tuve que presionar mucho a viejos amigos para conseguir esto.

translation.en: It was before your time. Before the Heart, for that matter.
translation.es: Fue antes que te sumaras. Antes que existiera el Corazón.

translation.en: A Chechen warlord was given free rein by the Chechen and Russian governments.
translation.es: Los gobiernos checheno y ruso dieron rienda suelta a un jefe militar checheno.

translation.en: The West, as always, were looking the other way.
translation.es: Occidente no quiso intervenir, como siempre.

translation.en: He was wiping out whole villages, trying to stamp out dissent.
translation.es: Arrasó pueblos enteros intentando acabar con la oposición.

translation.en: But… what's this got to do with Parker?
translation.es: Pero ¿qué tiene que ver con Parker?
Usó otra identidad y no dejó rastros electrónicos,

translation.en: But he was there, with MI6,
translation.es: pero estuvo ahí con el MI6.

translation.en: delivering weapons to take the warlord out.
translation.es: Entregaron armas para derrotar el jefe militar.

translation.en: You got an ETA yet? They'll be here.
[King] Intelligence came through from MI6 that their entire team had been executed.
translation.es: Llegó inteligencia del MI6 de que habían ejecutado a todo su equipo.

translation.en: We thought there was no one left to save.
translation.es: Creímos que no había a quién más salvar.

translation.en: The region was a tinderbox on the verge of full civil war.
translation.es: La región era un polvorín al borde de una guerra civil.

translation.en: We couldn't let those weapons fall into the warlord's hands.
translation.es: Debíamos evitar que el jefe militar tomara esas armas.

translation.en: It would have cost thousands of lives.
We had a drone that was stationed overhead armed with missiles.
translation.es: Teníamos un dron con misiles sobrevolando la zona.

translation.en: We made it look like a rebel force had ordered the drone strike.
translation.es: Fingimos que unos rebeldes habían ordenado el ataque del dron.
No redactaron un informe ni investigaron.

translation.en: No record of the personnel who had been involved.
translation.es: No dejaron registros del personal involucrado.

translation.en: So, you think… he knows it was us?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿crees que él sabe que fuimos nosotros?

translation.en: I think that's a safe assumption.
And now he wants to destroy the Charter.
translation.es: Y ahora quiere destruir al Cártel.

translation.en: You stick to the tech and leave strategy to me, okay?
translation.es: Ocúpate de la tecnología. La estrategia es mía, ¿sí?

translation.en: Let me remind you, we're partners. Okay? So if you want me to do my job,
translation.es: Te recuerdo que somos socios. Si quieres que haga mi trabajo, cuéntame el plan antes de ejecutarlo.

translation.en: you have to tell me what you're doing before you do it.
translation.es: Si quieres que haga mi trabajo, cuéntame el plan antes de ejecutarlo.

translation.en: Let me remind you, the Charter don't give two shits about people like Bailey and Yang.
translation.es: Te recuerdo que al Cártel no les importa la gente como Bailey y Yang.

translation.en: So, if you want us to succeed, you shouldn't either.
translation.es: Si quieres que tengamos éxito, que no te importen a ti.

translation.en: I'm a friend of your dad's.
She hacked into the camera feed.
Let's see how well she covered her tracks.
translation.es: Veamos qué tan bien cubrió sus huellas.

translation.en: I'm guessing it's not the nightlife.
translation.es: No habrás ido por la vida nocturna.

translation.en: [Parker] You ever done this before? Choppered in at over 40,000 feet?
translation.es: ¿Alguna vez volaste un helicóptero a más de 12 000 metros?
Pregunta capciosa. Ni yo ni nadie.

translation.en: But my mama always said I could do anything.
translation.es: Pero mi mamá dijo que podía hacer cualquier cosa.

translation.en: How long do we have before the Locker descends?
At which point, the Charter will realize what's going on.
translation.es: Ahí el Cártel se dará cuenta de qué pasa.

translation.en: It'll take nine minutes and 26 seconds for the Locker to drop to 40,000 feet.
translation.es: El locker tardará 9 minutos y 26 segundos en hacer el descenso.

translation.en: We'll have about eight minutes to get in, take the Heart, and get out again before they regain control.
translation.es: Debemos entrar, tomar el Corazón e irnos en 8 minutos o recuperarán el control.

translation.en: No. I'll be sure when it descends.
If they found my code, it won't descend, they'll be waiting for us, and we all die.
translation.es: Si hallan mi código, no descenderá, nos esperarán y matarán.

translation.en: Uh… nothing. But they need to pop their heads up at some point.
translation.es: No, pero tendrán que aparecer en algún momento.

translation.en: Oh no, no, no, no, no.
Get Nomad now! Get Nomad now!
Just get me up there. I'll do the rest.
translation.es: Solo llévame ahí arriba. Yo haré el resto.

translation.en: Nomad will string me up for this.
Tell her I stole your keys.
translation.es: Dile que te robé las llaves.

translation.en: You'll just have to trust me.

translation.es: Bien. La hora de la verdad.

translation.en: How will we know if it's worked?
The Locker has been dropped 15,000 feet in the last two minutes.
translation.es: El locker cayó 4000 metros en los últimos dos minutos.

translation.en: Security systems are all down. I'm locked out.
translation.es: No hay seguridad. No puedo entrar al sistema.

translation.en: -How is that even possible? Another hack? -No. No.
translation.es: ¿Cómo puede ser? ¿Otro hackeo? No, por eso lo hicieron la primera vez. Estaba inactivo en el sistema hasta ahora.

translation.en: This is why they did it the first time. It's been lying dormant in our system until now.
translation.es: No, por eso lo hicieron la primera vez. Estaba inactivo en el sistema hasta ahora.

translation.en: [Ivo] The air lock's been breached. Contact every Charter agent in the region.
translation.es: - Rompieron la esclusa de aire. - Contacta a los agentes de la zona.
Están todos a más de 800 kilómetros.

translation.en: [pilot] Approaching coordinates in five, four, three--
translation.es: Nos acercamos a las coordenadas en cinco, cuatro, tres…

translation.en: -I hope you know what you're doing. -[Stone] Tell me about it.
translation.es: - Ojalá sepas lo que haces. - Ni que lo digas.

translation.en: -We have a something approaching fast. -[Nomad] A something?
I think-- I think it's a someone.
I have to descend. Lower the rotor speed.
translation.es: Debo descender para bajar la velocidad del rotor.

translation.en: [Parker] Copy that. See you in seven minutes.
translation.es: Entendido. Te veo en siete minutos.

translation.en: The ship's lining is filled with hydrogen. One spark, and we're all dead.
translation.es: Hay hidrógeno en la nave. Una chispa y todos morimos.

translation.en: No way to get hold of her.
I told you not to get out of the van.
translation.es: Dije que no salieras de la camioneta.

translation.en: You also told me to have some fun.
And now you answer to me.
[Parker] Shame about your parachute. You'll be needing that.
translation.es: Qué pena lo de tu paracaídas. Lo necesitarás.

translation.en: -We'll be lucky to get to base as it is. -[grunts]
translation.es: Con suerte llegaremos a la base.

translation.en: Give me that thing before somebody gets--
You're gonna secret-agent our way back to civilization,
translation.es: Nos harás regresar a la civilización

translation.en: and I'm gonna follow three steps behind you with this gun.
translation.es: y yo te seguiré muy de cerca con esta arma.

translation.en: But I encrypted it to my biometrics, so it's useless without me.
translation.es: Lo codifiqué con mi biometría. No funciona sin mí.

translation.en: If I shoot you now, all this is over.
translation.es: Si te disparo ahora, esto se acabó.

translation.en: Show you the same mercy you showed Bailey and Yang.
translation.es: Te tendré la compasión que les tuviste a Bailey y Yang.

translation.en: It's what the Heart would tell you to do.
translation.es: Es lo que el Corazón indicaría.

translation.en: Trying to get even with Niam Kharche for kicking you out of the penthouse?
translation.es: ¿Quieres vengarte de Niam Kharche por echarte del penthouse?

translation.en: Right. You think you know everything.
translation.es: Claro. Crees que lo sabes todo.

translation.en: I bet the Heart told you that he adopted me,
translation.es: El Corazón te habrá dicho que me adoptó y me sacó de la nada,

translation.en: lifted me out of nothing. But did it tell you why?
translation.es: El Corazón te habrá dicho que me adoptó y me sacó de la nada, pero ¿te dijo por qué?

translation.en: Kharche used my parents like lab rats in a medical trial, and it killed them.
translation.es: Kharche usó a mis padres como cobayos en un ensayo médico que los mató.

translation.en: He covered everything up and took me in thinking he was doing me a favor,
translation.es: Tapó todo y me acogió creyendo que me hacía un favor.

translation.en: but I let him think that because I knew one day,
translation.es: Dejé que lo creyera porque sabía que algún día le haría pagar por lo que les hizo a mis padres.

translation.en: I'd be strong enough to make him pay for what he did to my parents.
translation.es: porque sabía que algún día le haría pagar por lo que les hizo a mis padres.

translation.en: So, you get to tear the whole world down?
Oh, this is not just for me. It's for people like me.
translation.es: Esto no es solo por mí. Es por la gente como yo.

translation.en: I've got my whole naughty list, and we're going to expose them all.
translation.es: Expondremos a todos los que se portan mal.

translation.en: With no thought of what comes next.
And you think the Charter's any better?
Just because they saved you doesn't make them good.
translation.es: No son buenos solo porque te salvaron.

translation.en: You think I didn't look into you?
How many schools did you get kicked out of?
Always a rebel. Always a problem.
And gives you that discipline that you so clearly crave.
translation.es: y te dio la disciplina que tanto anhelabas.

translation.en: But did they take you in because you were good?
But there's a woman I know only as Nomad.
translation.es: Pero una mujer que conozco como Nómada

translation.en: showed me what's possible when there's someone watching your back.
translation.es: y me mostró lo que es posible cuando alguien te protege.

translation.en: Parker's coming for you, and I wanna have a bigger gun when he shows up.
translation.es: Parker vendrá por ti y quiero recibirlo con un arma más grande.

translation.en: Okay, let's just, um, give them a good cover story.
translation.es: A ver, vamos a inventar una buena excusa.

translation.en: They'll keep us alive for ransom. We reel them in, and then bam.
translation.es: Nos dejarán vivas para pedir rescate. Se confiarán y bam.

translation.en: Just to be clear, the "bam" is for you to take them out.
translation.es: Para aclarar, el bam es que los matas.

translation.en: [in English] You know, the Charter can take down Kharche.
translation.es: El Cártel puede acabar con Kharche.

translation.en: Parker's way isn't the only way.
translation.es: El método de Parker no es el único.

translation.en: Killing her wasn't the deal either. You have to pay me now.
translation.es: Matarla tampoco era el trato. Tienes que pagarme ahora.

translation.en: You're a hard woman to find.
Dhawan is back with Parker. I slipped her a tracker.
translation.es: Dhawan regresó con Parker. Le puse un rastreador.

translation.en: They're heading north. Looping you in now.
translation.es: Se dirigen al norte. Te envío las coordenadas.

translation.en: Nice to hear your voice. I was a bit worried about you.
translation.es: Me alegra oírte. Estaba algo preocupada por ti.

translation.en: Okay, got her. They're heading towards Iceland.
translation.es: Bien, la tengo. Se dirigen hacia Islandia.

translation.en: I take it I'm no longer compromised.
translation.es: Supongo que ya no estoy expuesta.

translation.en: Well, they have the Heart, so we're all compromised.
translation.es: Tienen el Corazón. Todos estamos expuestos.

translation.en: Parker's coming after the Charter, so we're heading to a secure location.
translation.es: Parker viene por el Cártel. Iremos a un lugar seguro.

translation.en: Clubs is assembling a team. We'll make sure they're on the ground by the time you arrive.
translation.es: Los Tréboles arman un equipo. Llegará a tiempo para recibirte.

translation.en: Just get there as fast as you can.
If they get the Heart online, God knows what they're capable of.
translation.es: Si conectan el Corazón, quién sabe qué podrían hacer.

translation.en: It's not impregnable, but it's the best we've got.
translation.es: No es impenetrable, pero es lo mejor que hay.

translation.en: If the Heart wants to find us, it will.
translation.es: Si el Corazón quiere hallarnos, lo hará.

translation.en: [Stone] Will this hunk of junk make it to Iceland?
Nice trick you pulled with the facial recognition yesterday.
translation.es: Buen truco el del reconocimiento facial.

translation.en: Trying to put a lock on our new toy.
Would you come back for me if I hadn't?
I know where they're going. Reykjavik University computer lab.
translation.es: Van al aula de informática de la Universidad de Reikiavik.

translation.en: It has a cryo-storage facility, several floors of servers.
translation.es: Tiene almacenaje criogénico y muchísimos servidores.

translation.en: The tracker's heading straight for it.
See, Keya, don't say I don't keep my promises.
translation.es: Keya, no digas que no cumplo mis promesas.

translation.en: Okay, be ready. You know your instructions.
translation.es: Bien, prepárense. Ya saben qué tienen que hacer.

translation.en: Couple of minutes, we'll be up and running.
translation.es: Estará todo listo en unos minutos.

translation.en: Emails, texts, bank accounts. The Heart's using my algorithm to sort through it all.
translation.es: Correos, mensajes, cuentas bancarias. El Corazón analiza todo con mi algoritmo.

translation.en: So, we can find anyone? Gain access to anything?
translation.es: ¿Podemos hallar a todos y acceder a todo?

translation.en: Greatest skeleton key in the world.
translation.es: La mejor llave maestra del mundo.

translation.en: Evidence of Kharche's years of experiments on innocents across the country.
translation.es: Pruebas de que Kharche experimentó con inocentes por años.

translation.en: That's the truth… for the world to see.
translation.es: Esa es la verdad. La verán todos.

translation.en: That's impressive. But let's see what else this thing can do.
translation.es: Es impresionante. Veamos qué más hace.

translation.en: [woman] Nancy Morrison. King of Diamonds. Ex-CIA.
translation.es: Nancy Morrison: Rey de Diamantes. Trabajaba en la CIA.

translation.en: The Heart tells us she's heading to a safe house with her family.
translation.es: El Corazón dice que va a un refugio con su familia.

translation.en: [man] Hang on. I have another one.
I think you're gonna like this, boss.
An unidentified military plane landed at a private airfield 33 minutes ago.
translation.es: Un avión militar no identificado aterrizó en un aeródromo hace 33 minutos.

translation.en: Jiang Hsu. Served 35 years in Chinese State Security Service.
translation.es: Jiang Hsu. Trabajó 35 años en la Seguridad del Estado chino.

translation.en: The King of Clubs is here in Iceland.
translation.es: El Rey de Tréboles está en Islandia.

translation.en: Even better. Where is he now?
Sending the plans now. Stone is on her way.
translation.es: Te envío los planos. Stone está en camino.

translation.en: We don't have time to wait. Tell her to follow us in.
translation.es: No podemos esperarla. Dile que nos siga.

translation.en: Any news of Spades or Hearts?
There were other people in that elevator. In that lobby.
translation.es: Había más personas en ese ascensor. En ese vestíbulo.

translation.en: You said we were going to expose Kharche and then the Charter, not murder them.
translation.es: Dijiste que expondríamos a Kharche y luego al Cártel, no asesinarlos.

translation.en: The King of Hearts with her team. They're in a bunker outside of London.
translation.es: El Rey de Corazones con su equipo en un búnker a las afueras de Londres.

translation.en: -We'll see you on the other side. -You're going in with them?
I ordered the strike on Parker. It's only fair.
translation.es: Yo ordené el ataque a Parker. Debo hacerlo.

translation.en: You know… I would have made the same call in Chechnya.
translation.es: Habría tomado la misma decisión en Chechenia.

translation.en: [Jack] Oh God. They've shut off our ventilation system.
translation.es: Santo cielo, apagaron el sistema de ventilación.

translation.en: At this rate, about an hour and we're out of oxygen.
translation.es: A este ritmo, nos quedaremos sin oxígeno dentro de una hora.

translation.en: The Charter never worries about who gets in their way. Neither will we.
translation.es: El Cártel elimina sus obstáculos. Nosotros también.

translation.en: [woman] King of Hearts is locked in. They'll be dead in an hour.
-You have to stop this, please. -Someone has to control this power, Keya.
translation.es: - Detén esto, por favor. - Alguien debe controlar este poder.

translation.en: -Why not us? -This is not what we agreed.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué no nosotros? - No era el plan.

translation.en: You're still not seeing the bigger picture.
This isn't about some pissy little grievance you had with the bad man who killed your mom and dad.
translation.es: No se trata de una pelea con un hombre que mató a tus padres.

translation.en: Concentrated in the hands of the few, of the very few who could use it for good,
translation.es: Concentrado en las manos de unos pocos que podrían usarlo para el bien,

translation.en: who could actually make a change, but they don't.
translation.es: que podrían cambiar todo, pero no lo hacen.

translation.en: At this moment, we are mining trillions of pieces of data.
translation.es: En este momento, estamos extrayendo billones de datos.

translation.en: In a matter of hours, I will be able to take down
translation.es: En cuestión de horas, podré eliminar a los miembros restantes del Cártel.

translation.en: the remaining members of the Charter.
translation.es: podré eliminar a los miembros restantes del Cártel.

translation.en: We've been used and manipulated our whole lives.
translation.es: Nos usaron y manipularon toda la vida.

translation.en: Now it's time for us to take control.
translation.es: Es hora de tomar el control.

translation.en: [man] Clubs team are inside the university building.
translation.es: Los Tréboles están en la universidad.

translation.en: You wanna know how great men get power, Keya?
translation.es: ¿Sabes cómo los grandes hombres consiguen poder?

translation.en: It's not because they earn it…
translation.es: No es porque se lo ganen

translation.en: It is because when the moment comes,
Stone, you need to get out now.
I have a failsafe uploading. It will disable the Heart.
translation.es: Cargo algo que inhabilitará el Corazón.

translation.en: They won't be able to access it without me.
I'm outside. But you already know that.
translation.es: Estoy afuera, pero ya lo sabes.

translation.en: No, you're not. It's a trap.
translation.es: No estás afuera, es una trampa.

translation.en: The lab is a decoy. You need to get your team out now.
translation.es: El laboratorio es un señuelo. Saca a tu equipo ya.

translation.en: -Why should I believe you? -Because you were right.
translation.es: ¿Por qué debería creerte? Porque tenías razón acerca de Parker, acerca de todo.

translation.en: Okay? You told me about Parker, and you were right about everything.
translation.es: Porque tenías razón acerca de Parker, acerca de todo.

translation.en: My parents would have never wanted this.
translation.es: Mis padres no habrían querido esto.

translation.en: Get your team out of there right now.
translation.es: Saca a tu equipo de ahí ya mismo.

translation.en: I'm sending you my coordinates. I'll leave the back door open.
translation.es: Te envío mis coordenadas. Dejaré la puerta trasera abierta.

translation.en: [grunts] I'm Nine of Hearts. I need your radio.
translation.es: Soy Nueve de Corazones. Dame tu radio.

translation.en: This is Nine of Hearts. Get out of there. It's a trap.
translation.es: Soy Nueve de Corazones. Salgan, es una trampa.

translation.en: Do you hear me? She found the tracker. Get out of there.
I-- Could be minutes. Could be hours.
translation.es: Podríamos tardar unos minutos o quizá horas.

translation.en: You have until I get back.
[Ivo] There must be an emergency override system.
translation.es: Debe haber un plan de emergencia.

translation.en: Jack, is there any way we can get hold of Stone?
No. No comms. We're still offline.
-[Nomad] Stone, thank God. Where are you? -Clubs are dead.
translation.es: - Menos mal. ¿Dónde estás? - Los Tréboles murieron.

translation.en: What new intel? [Stone] Keya. She shut down the Heart.
translation.es: - ¿Qué información nueva? - Keya desconectó el Corazón.

translation.en: -How do you know she's not playing you? -I don't.
[Nomad] We're gonna die in less than an hour.
translation.es: Moriremos en menos de una hora.

translation.en: -She shut down our air supply. -[Stone] Parker did.
translation.es: - Ella cortó el suministro de aire. - Fue Parker.

translation.en: I'd be dead too if I hadn't listened to her.
translation.es: Habría muerto de no ser por ella.

translation.en: I trust her, and you need to trust me.
translation.es: Confío en ella. Debes confiar en mí.

translation.en: [Parker] I know you're in here, Keya.
You know, you still have a choice.
You can still be a part of this.
translation.es: Aún puedes ser parte de esto.

translation.en: -Would you like me to wait? -[Stone] Definitely no.
No, we'll be needing those. Knees?
I need to get back in there.
The Heart has to be disconnected and reconnected again to the servers.
translation.es: Debo descontar y reconectar el Corazón a los servidores.

translation.en: Any interference, the system automatically shuts down. You know that.
translation.es: El sistema se apaga ante cualquier interferencia. Lo sabes.

translation.en: This doesn't end well for you, Stone. Take another step, and she's dead.
translation.es: Esto no terminará bien, Stone. Da otro paso y la mato.

translation.en: -I don't care. I'm here for you. -[Parker] Bullshit.
translation.es: No me importa. Vine por ti. Mentira.

translation.en: You and I know that without this one,
translation.es: Los dos sabemos que sin ella

translation.en: the Heart stays down and everyone inside that bunker dies,
translation.es: el Corazón no se reactivará y los del búnker morirán,

translation.en: unless, of course, they're dead already.
translation.es: si es que ya no murieron.

translation.en: I have the Heart, and I have the Kings. That's a winning hand.
translation.es: Tengo el Corazón y a los Reyes. Una mano ganadora.

translation.en: Good girl. Now, kick it away.
And why do you have to kill them to make it?
I've served my entire life, Rachel, and none of it mattered.
translation.es: He servido toda mi vida y no tuvo ningún efecto.

translation.en: The world is still in chaos.
The Heart has the power to change everything.
translation.es: El Corazón tiene el poder de cambiar todo,

translation.en: But the Charter are using it to keep things exactly as they are.
translation.es: pero el Cártel lo usa para mantener el statu quo.

translation.en: You don't wanna change anything. You just wanna be the one in charge.
translation.es: No quieres cambiar nada, solo quieres estar a cargo.

translation.en: First thing you did with all that power was kill people.
translation.es: Lo primero que hiciste fue matar gente.

translation.en: [scoffs] The problem with men like you, Parker,
translation.es: El problema con hombres como tú

translation.en: is that your power is only ever based on threats and violence.
translation.es: es que tu poder solo se basa en amenazas y violencia.

translation.en: And when you brutalize everyone around you, even your own team…
translation.es: Y cuando maltratas a quienes te rodean, aun a tu propio equipo,

translation.en: you'll never have the one thing I know I always will.
translation.es: jamás tendrás lo único que sé que siempre tendré.

translation.en: See you when I get there. [exhales]
It's good to hear from you, Stone.
translation.es: Me alegra oír tu voz, Stone.

translation.en: [girl] But what is it? Who's it from?
I decided to embrace the cliché and use my time in jail to get ripped.
translation.es: Acepté el cliché y me volveré musculosa en prisión.

translation.en: And you? Back with the Charter?
[inhales] Yeah, I'm back with the Charter.

translation.es: El Corazón es una gran herramienta.

translation.en: If we only follow the odds, we'll never do anything in spite of the odds.
translation.es: Si te riges por las probabilidades, jamás te arriesgarás a nada.

translation.en: And what if the odds tell you to do nothing?
translation.es: ¿Y si te dicen que no hagas nada?
En esos casos me envían a mí.

translation.en: I wanna surround myself with people who will change the world for good.
translation.es: Quiero rodearme de gente que cambie el mundo para bien.

translation.en: The good news, I've scouted the square, and your plan just might work.
translation.es: La buena: exploré la plaza y tu plan podría funcionar.

translation.en: [exhales] Uh, they were out of oat milk.
What? You told me to blend in.
Did we get into the power grid?
Yeah. It wasn't that hard, because their password was "password."
translation.es: Sí, no fue muy difícil. La contraseña era "contraseña".

translation.en: Um, you know we can still throw you in jail, right?
translation.es: Sabes que podemos enviarte a prisión, ¿no?

translation.en: We stay in the van, boss.
-The Heart's all set. -[Stone] And the diversion?
translation.es: - El Corazón está listo. - ¿Y la distracción?
